bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Submersible, Three-Phase Transformers, 3750 kVA and Smaller: High Voltage, 34 500 GrdY/19 920 Volts and Below; Low Voltage, 600 Volts and Below
IEEE Draft Standard for Submersible, Three-Phase Transformers, 3750 kVA and Smaller: High Voltage, 34 500 GrdY/19 920 Volts and Below; Low Voltage, 600 Volts and Below
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC57.12.24/D4, Apr 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is intended for use as a basis for establishing the performance, electrical and mechanical interchangeability, and safety of the equipment covered, and to assist in the proper selection of such equipment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
